dict.acceptation: 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士；

sent.orig: When we were out on holidays, my sister sister kept home fins burning.
sent.trans: 我们出去度假时，我妹妹照料着家，等着欢迎我们回来。

sent.orig: Sister Ann, Sister Ann, Said Fatima, is anyone in the dust?
sent.trans: 安姐姐，安姐姐，法蒂玛问，尘土里有人吗？

sent.orig: Later, Huang also mentioned knife will Hemeimei stem sister and sister-in-law fled after the killing.
sent.trans: 随后，黄又提刀将何某某的干姐及弟媳杀害后逃离。

sent.orig: Li Ling's elder sister is a chubBette while her younger sister is a beanpole.
sent.trans: 李玲的姐姐是个矮胖墩儿，可她妹妹却是个细高个儿。

sent.orig: Furthermore,each Williams sister derives an inner strength from being a Williams sister.
sent.trans: 此外，姊妹俩各自从威廉姆斯家汲取了内在的力量。
